About me

Software engineer with experience in Model-Based Testing in the automotive industry, focused on validation, verification, and software quality for complex systems.

Frontend developer with hands-on experience in JavaScript, HTML, CSS, Bootstrap, and build tools such as Webpack. Additional backend experience with Node.js, supporting web application development.

Open to exploring QA, embedded systems, electronics, and emerging technologies in both software and hardware. Familiar with UI/UX and digital design using Figma and Adobe Premiere, with focus on clean, efficient, and reliable solutions.

Work Experience

Software System Engineer

October 2023 - October 2024

Bertrandt Group

The main tasks within the project included the automation of software testing in Matlab/Simulink, enhancement of methods for modelling and specification of test cases in compliance with ASIL D, improvement of test processes, test execution and reporting, and issue tracking.

System Software Engineer Trainee

July 2023 - September 2024

Bertrandt Group

My activities within the MBD Academy included learning the V-Model process, gaining knowledge of AUTOSAR software architecture, introduction to the Automotive SPICE industry standard, and training in Matlab/Simulink model design.
